content: materials purl soho s witch hazel 1 100% pima cotton yarn each ball of this chunky/bulky-weight yarn is approximately 48 yards/50 grams - color a 7 balls approximately 336 yards required we used heirloom white - color b 7 balls approximately 336 yards required we used chamomile yellow you ll also need - us 10 6 mm 47-inch circular needles 2 - a stitch marker - scrap yarn or a removable stitch marker 3 note we used nearly every last yard for our blanket to avoid running short be sure to check your gauge reuse your swatch yarn and keep tails short or consider ordering an extra ball of each color to be safe if you don t end up needing it you can return it for a refund within 30 days of purchase or within 6 months for store credit our return policy 4 has all the details gauge 10½ stitches and 21 row = 4 inches in garter stitch unlaundered size - finished dimensions unlaundered 29 inches wide and 35 inches tall - finished dimensions gently machine washed + dried 26 inches wide and 31½ inches tall designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 5 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 6 all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/witch-hazel html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions html type_filter=902&collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions html type_filter=902&collection_filter=964 4 https //www purlsoho com/return-policy 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
